title: Naughty Stories from A to Z
description: Renowned erotic authors including Ann Blakely, M. Christian, Dante Davidson, Marilyn Jaye Lewis, N.T. Morley, and Thomas Roche explore their naughty sides. From A to Z, these stories are S-E-X-Y. It takes a naughty mind like Alison Tyler's to put together a book this provocative.
author: Alison Tyler
